title: Nissin Men-nashi Donbei x Himote House
original_name: 日清麺なしどん兵衛 × ひもてはうす
sinopse: A collaboration between Himote House and Nissin. Each episode begins with an introduction by the talking cat Enishi and is followed by an ad-libbed performance by a member of the Himote House promoting Nissin's line of soup cups that substitute noodles with tofu.
